strings.Value: {n}The young guard is holding her weapon with limp hands as blood streams down her bent and broken armor.{/n} "Your Grace, at last! I'm not sure how much longer we'd have made it without you!"

"Despite the dire situation, we're holding on. There have been casualties, but we're evacuating as many civilians as we can to safe locations... You made it just in time, Your Grace. You can still save your people and your capital!"

"Monsters, Your Grace! Hydras, manticores, some sort of creatures like bears but with bird heads... At first we thought it was an enemy army, but there are no humans among them! They don't seem to be led by anyone! They just keep coming and coming and coming... like an avalanche!"
"It's a disaster. Most of the guards have fallen. There are heavy — enormous — casualties among the civilians... I don't even know what kind of miracle we'd need to turn the course of this battle!"
"I'm wounded. The captain ordered me to stand guard here to help civilians flee and await your arrival. By {g|Abadar}Abadar{/g}, I'm so glad you finally made it!"
"Thank you, Your Grace! {g|Abadar}Abadar{/g} willing, we'll show these beasts what we're made of!"
"Yes, I just saw him! He ran past with a group of reinforcements, cursing up hill and down dale. I'm not sure where he was headed, though."
